description: This is a market on who will win in the FTX Crypto Cup preliminary match-up between Daniil Dubov and Hikaru Nakamura, scheduled to take place on May 24, 2021 at 3:00 PM ET. The market will resolve to “Dubov” if Daniil Dubov wins, or “Nakamura” if Hikaru Nakamura wins. If the preliminary game is a draw, the market will resolve to 50 cents Dubov and 50 cents Nakamura. If the preliminary game is postponed to a day on or before May 31, 2021, the same market conditions will apply. If the preliminary game is postponed to a day after May 31, 2021, or is cancelled altogether, the market will resolve to 50 cents Dubov and 50 cents Nakamura. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).
